amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Commodity Futures Trading Commission by $17,578,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the Commodity Futures Trading Commission by $17,578,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 227 (Roll no. 307).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
